resources.string: In order to connect to hue lights we need to enable the application to connect to your hue bridge. To do this you need to click the center button of your bridge and immediately hit continue. If you cancel, the app will not function until you re-open and accept. If you hit continue and the app doesn\'t function, make sure your hue bridge is connected to the same wifi network as your phone. If errors keep happening please file a bug.
If you would like to re-connect to a bridge, please fully close and re-open the app.

Are you sure you would like to reset hue settings? You will need to re-sync this app with your bridge. You will also need to shut down your lights manually. Resetting is helpful when you want to connect to a different bridge.
